title: Tag Category
description: This schema defines the Tag Category entity. A Tag Category contains tags called Primary Tags. Primary Tags can further have children Tags called Secondary Tags. Only two levels of tags are supported currently.

id.description: Unique identifier of this entity instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this tag category.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to the tag category.

usageCount.description: Count of how many times the tags from this tag category are used.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

disabled.description: System tag categories can't be deleted. Use this flag to disable them.

mutuallyExclusive.description: Tags under this category are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` the tags from this category are used to **classify** an entity. An entity can only be in one class - example, it can only be either `tier1` or `tier2` and not both. When mutually exclusive is `false`, the tags from this category are used to **categorize** an entity. An entity can be in multiple categories simultaneously - example a customer can be `newCustomer` and `atRisk` simultaneously.
